participant_1.background:
I crashed my favorite RC car into a tree.
i married miss usa.
my lifes goal is to be the worlds foremost encyclopedia salesman.
i like to vote.
I am a family person who enjoys watching Netflix in my spare time.

participant_2.background:
I am often up late at night working on my art, so I'm not a morning person.
i likw to go to the farmers markets to buy local veggies and fruits.
after finishing my career i discovered that i m not that pasionate about it.
I take my dog on hiking trips up volcanoes, and he loves the challenge!
I wake up and take a moment to appreciate the view of the ocean from my window.

content.text: Good evening to you! What is your favorite way to spend a free day?
I like to spend time with my family and watch Netflix. What about you?
I love to go hiking with my dog, but I also enjoy going to farmers markets.
I would love to hike with my dog, but he is afraid of heights.
That is unfortunate. I do not mind heights, but I am not a morning person.
Neither am I. I like to sleep in as much as possible.
I enjoy waking up early to take a moment to appreciate the view of the ocean from my window.
That sounds lovely. I have never lived near the ocean, so I do not have that luxury.
I am lucky to live in a beautiful area. How about you? Do you live in a beautiful area?
I do. I live in a small town in the mountains.
That sounds peaceful. I live in a big city, so it can be loud and busy.
I think it is important to find peace in the chaos.
I agree. I try to find peace in my art and in nature.
That is a great way to find peace
